message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand you're on a budget, but I've got to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you be willing to meet me at $140?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $135?
I'm getting closer to meeting your budget, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $138, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $132?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I can do $136, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to consider $130?

I've already met you at $130, and you countered back down to $130. I'm not willing to go any lower than that. I think we're at a stalemate. I'm willing to meet you at $134, but that's as low as I can go. This is my final offer.
